publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-6162 Christina McKelvie: Congratulations to Hamilton Acciesâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Hamilton Academical FC on retaining Scottish Premier League status for a further year; pays tribute to the players, fans, groundstaff and all other associated staff; gives praise to the manager, Billy Reid, for his excellent leadership of his team, and looks forward to another successful season for the Accies.
S3M-6162 Congratulations to Hamilton Accies (lodged on 19 April 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-6162 Congratulations to Hamilton Accies (lodged on 19 April 2010) Rob Gibson*, Gil Paterson*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-6162 Congratulations to Hamilton Accies (lodged on 19 April 2010) Linda Fabiani*
